law.text: Whenever the commissioner finds that there has been a violation of this subtitle or any administrative regulations promulgated pursuant thereto, the commissioner shall conduct a hearing in accordance with this chapter and KRS Chapter 13B.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1306, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 238, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 19, sec. 13, effective June 18, 1970.
